string.text: They say Ghost was buddies with Strelok, haven't you heard?
I want to find Ghost, don't you know where he might be?
You don't know anything about Ghost?
I need to find Ghost, can't you tell me something?
I don't know! What are you pestering me for...
Everyone needs something... I need stuff too...
All the ghosts have vanished, that's how it is...
I don't know! What are you pestering me for...
Have you heard of a stalker by the name of Strelok?
I'm looking for a stalker named Strelok, don't you know of such a guy?
Don't you know anything about Strelok?
They say there was such a stalker - Strelok, haven't you heard of him?
No...
Listen! You're getting on my nerves with your Strelok!
What I knew, I told you, and that's it...
How long can this go on?! Strelok, Shmelok...
What was that story you had here with the truck?
Have you heard anything about strange trucks?
Trucks with dead people... Have you heard about such things?
What do you think about trucks from the center of the Zone?
Listen, beat it... Why are you pestering me?
You'd better mind your own business instead of babbling about such nonsense...
What I know - that's my business! And talking about such things - that's asking for trouble!
Have you lost your mind? Talking about such things!
Hello, what are you planning to do?
What are you going to do? Got any plans?
Hello, what are you planning to do?
Where are you heading? Maybe together?
How are you doing with medicine? Want to trade something?
If I need anything - I'll get it at the Bar... Why are you pestering me?
Maybe we could exchange some medical supplies?
No way! I get my medicine from trusted places...
I have some extra medical supplies, don't you want to trade?
No, friend... I'm not a dealer, I only have what I need for myself...
I found some PDAs, maybe we could trade?
I already told you: I don't have any!
I have working PDAs, don't you want to exchange?
Get lost! I got nothing to do...
Don't you have a spare PDA? We could trade...
Why are you pestering me? I'm not going to trade...
Listen, beat it... Why are you pestering me?
That's my business, what and with whom...
Listen, beat it... Why are you pestering me?
Come on, move along... I'll figure it out without you.
Do you know any fresh jokes?
Haven't heard any new jokes?
Do you know any fresh jokes?
Maybe you could tell a joke for laughs?
No, there are no fresh ones... Just old stuff...
No new ones, and the old stuff is already getting on my nerves!
No, there are no fresh ones... Just old stuff...
What laughs! Death everywhere...
Heard anything interesting?
Haven't heard anything new?
Heard anything interesting?
What are people saying? What's happening?
I don't know anything else.
Nah, there's nothing new, it's all the same...
I don't know anything else.
They're just talking nonsense, I don't want to repeat it.
Take this bandage.
Take this medkit.
Information interests me. For money.
I can offer the following:
I can't offer anything.
Maybe some other time.
